summary: Peter Ware Higgs CH FRS FRSE  is an English theoretical physicist, and emeritus professor at the University of Edinburgh.
full_text: The Dirac Prize is the name of four prominent awards in the field of theoretical physics, computational chemistry, and mathematics, awarded by different organizations, named in honour of Professor Paul Dirac, one of the great theoretical physicists of the 20th Century.
title: Dirac Medal
